solution_line_template: The total cost of breakfast is ${bagel_cost} + ${orange_juice_cost} = $<<{bagel_cost}+{orange_juice_cost}={breakfast_total}>>{breakfast_total}.
The total cost of lunch is ${sandwich_cost} + ${milk_cost} = $<<{sandwich_cost}+{milk_cost}={lunch_total}>>{lunch_total}.
Anna spent ${lunch_total} - ${breakfast_total} = ${difference} more on lunch than breakfast.
